game.name: Echoes of Mora
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 신비로운 여정에 올라 흥미로운 상호작용과 의미 있는 만남으로 가득한 침몰한 마을을 탐험하고 시간을 여행하며 모라가 잃어버린 오빠를 찾을 수 있도록 도와주세요. PC 및 VR에서 플레이 가능.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a mysterious journey, filled with intriguing interactions and meaningful encounters, as you explore a sunken village and travel through time to help Mora find her lost brother. Playable on PC and VR.
